content:
Q: How do I redeem the free teleconsultation services?
A: If you have opted for the Enhanced Medical Benefits, you will receive an email from us to assist you to download an app in order to register for up to three (3) free teleconsultations each, for both you and your maid.
questions: What are the requirements to redeem free teleconsultation services?
How many free teleconsultations can I receive?
Is the free teleconsultation service available for my maid as well?
What should I do if I haven't received the email to redeem the teleconsultation services?
Which app do I need to download for the teleconsultation services?
Can I redeem the free teleconsultation services if I haven't opted for Enhanced Medical Benefits?
What steps do I need to follow to register for the teleconsultations?
Are there any limitations on the use of the free teleconsultation services?
How will I know if my registration for the teleconsultation is successful?
What happens if I need more than three teleconsultations?
